mapper.select: SELECT skd_title skdTitle, skd_start_time skdStartTime, '개인' skdCategory FROM schedule WHERE skd_cat_cd = (SELECT CODE FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'S001' AND code_nm = '개인') AND user_id = #{userId} AND #{todayYmd} BETWEEN skd_start_ymd AND skd_end_ymd UNION SELECT skd_title skdTitle, skd_start_time skdStartTime, '전체' skdCategory FROM schedule WHERE skd_cat_cd = (SELECT CODE FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'S001' AND code_nm = '전체') AND #{todayYmd} BETWEEN skd_start_ymd AND skd_end_ymd UNION SELECT skd_title skdTitle, skd_start_time skdStartTime, '부서' skdCategory FROM schedule WHERE skd_cat_cd = (SELECT dept_cd FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AND #{todayYmd} BETWEEN skd_start_ymd AND skd_end_ymd ORDER BY skdStartTime

SELECT skd_no skdNo, user_id userId, skd_cat_cd skdCatCd, skd_title skdTitle, skd_start_ymd skdStartYmd, skd_end_ymd skdEndYmd, skd_start_time skdStartTime, skd_end_time skdEndTime, skd_contents skdContents, c_date cDate, u_date uDate FROM schedule WHERE #{targetDate} BETWEEN skd_start_ymd AND skd_end_ymd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (user_id, skd_cat_cd, skd_title, skd_start_ymd, skd_end_ymd, skd_start_time, skd_end_time, skd_contents, c_date, u_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{skdCatCd}, #{skdTitle}, #{skdStartYmd}, #{skdEndYmd}, #{skdStartTime}, #{skdEndTime}, #{skdContents}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET skd_cat_cd = #{skdCatCd}, skd_title = #{skdTitle}, skd_start_ymd = #{skdStartYmd}, skd_end_ymd = #{skdEndYmd}, skd_start_time = #{skdStartTime}, skd_end_time = #{skdEndTime}, skd_contents = #{skdContents}, u_date = NOW() WHERE skd_no = #{skdNo}
